title: AP Research Student

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose a player to interview. The following night, you will have a private chat with your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are titled "Journalist" in this private channel.
- All of your messages in this private channel must be in the form of a question. If you fail to do this you are instantly Modkilled.
- By the end of the night, in your player channel, you must send a paragraph report summarizing the interview you had that night.
- The following day, your report is sent into daychat, as well as a request to either react to your report with a thumbs-up or thumbs-down.
- This report is processed towards your goal when the day ends.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have 2 reports have more likes than dislikes.
